segments.text: I watch as the woman polishes that plate, seemingly in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost serene, but the chaos around her tells a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted that she doesn’t notice the water pouring onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the hazards lurking around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are taking cookies without a care, which adds to my anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’re going to get caught or if they’ll have to face a consequence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As I watch them, a part of me is amused by their mischief, despite the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
